events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the package still hasn’t arrived. The estimated delivery date has long passed, and the tracking info hasn’t been updated in days.
The case has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to the customer reporting a late shipment and tracking issues.
A customer service representative has been assigned to assist with the reported delivery delay for this order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your concern about the delayed delivery and I’m here to help you resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can look into the shipment status for you?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the last tracking update said it was at the local distribution center three days ago but no further progress.
Thank you for the information. I have contacted the shipping carrier and requested an urgent status update. We expect to have an update within 24 hours and will keep you posted.
Thanks for following up quickly, I appreciate you checking with the carrier. I look forward to the update.
The shipment is now out for delivery and should reach you by the end of today. We apologize for the delay and appreciate your patience.
We wanted to check in and confirm that your package was received and that everything arrived in good condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As your delivery issue has been resolved, we are now closing this case. Thank you for your understanding and please contact us anytime for future support.
